# <a name="error-550553-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="40043-102">Klaida 550/553 Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="40043-102">Error 550/553 in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="40043-103">Kai esate toli nuo namų ir siunčiate el. laišką iš prijungtos paskyros naudodami Outlook.com, el. laiškas gali būti grąžintas su 550, 553 arba relės draudžiamu klaidos pranešimu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="40043-103">When you're away from home and send an email from your connected account using Outlook.com, your email message might be returned with a 550, 553, or relay-prohibited error message.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="40043-104">[Patikrinkite el. pašto sinchronizavimo parametrus](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) **dalyje Parametrai**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="40043-104">Check your [email sync settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) at **Settings**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="40043-105">> **Peržiūrėkite visus "Outlook" parametrus** > **Pašto** > **sinchronizavimo el. paštas**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="40043-105">> **View all Outlook settings** > **Mail** > **Sync email**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="40043-106">Įsitikinkite, kad numatytasis adresas yra toks pat kaip el. pašto domeno vardas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="40043-106">Make sure your default from address is the same as your email domain name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="40043-107">Jei turite savo el. pašto domeną, pakeiskite jį į outlook.com, live.com arba hotmail.com adresą.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="40043-107">If you have your own email domain included, change it to your outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com address.</span></span>
